title: @compute_OC_weights
description: Compute optimal combined weights dataset for multi-echo EPI data.

echo_times.title: Echo times
echo_times.description: Specify echo times as list (e.g., "15 30.5 41"). Use either -echo_times or -echo_times_files.

echo_times_file.title: Echo times file
echo_times_file.description: Specify file with echo times. Use either -echo_times or -echo_times_files.

echo_dsets.title: Echo datasets
echo_dsets.description: Specify one run of multi-echo EPI data.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Specify prefix of resulting OC weights dataset (e.g., OC.weights.SUBJ).

def_to_equal.title: Default to equal weights
def_to_equal.description: Specify whether to default to equal weights (default = no).

oc_method.title: OC method
oc_method.description: Specify which OC method to employ (default = OC_A).

sum_weight_tolerance.title: Sum weight tolerance
sum_weight_tolerance.description: Tolerance for summed weight difference from 1.0 (default = 0.001).

work_dir.title: Working directory
work_dir.description: Specify directory to compute results in.
